article:
Births
* 450 BC – Alcibiades, Athenian general and politician (approximate date)
  (d. c. 404 BC)

Deaths
* 459 BC ** Pleistarchus, King of Sparta ** Themistocles, Athenian politician
* 456 BC – Aeschylus, Greek playwright (b. 525 BC)
* 451 BC – Verginia, legendary victim of the decemviri
* 450 BC ** Cimon, major political figure in Athens and the son of Miltiades
  (approximate date) (b. 510 BC) ** Alexander I, king of Macedonia
  (approximate date)

References
